text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b13af50f73dd89503c915f76fcf92be58789521a|patch 8.2.0269: Vim9: operator after list index does not work>
patch 8.2.0269: Vim9: operator after list index does not work

Problem:    Vim9: operator after list index does not work. (Yasuhiro
            Matsumoto)
Solution:   After indexing a list change the type to the list member type.
            (closes #5651)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0269: Vim9: operator after list index does not work · vim/vim@b13af50
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0269: Vim9: operator after list index does not work · vim/vim@b13af50
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: operator after list index does not work. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto) Solution: After indexing a list change the type to the list member type. (closes #5651)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/82f654e092ac5b86316bc1b30c0b07a849813186|patch 8.2.0271: the "num64" feature is available everywhere>
patch 8.2.0271: the "num64" feature is available everywhere

Problem:    The "num64" feature is available everywhere and building without
            it causes problems.
Solution:   Graduage the "num64" feature. (James McCoy, closes #5650)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/414b79662786762256e756ece8ab4aaecbbf9bd1|patch 8.2.0272: ":helptags ALL" gives error for some directories>
patch 8.2.0272: ":helptags ALL" gives error for some directories

Problem:    ":helptags ALL" gives error for directories without write
            permission. (Matěj Cepl)
Solution:   Ignore errors for ":helptags ALL". (Ken Takata, closes #5026,
            closes #5652)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1fa8d2c33d7290eda7dc2a94d4ec6a599a2d61dd|patch 8.2.0273: MS-Windows uninstall may delete wrong batch file>
patch 8.2.0273: MS-Windows uninstall may delete wrong batch file

Problem:    MS-Windows uninstall may delete wrong batch file.
Solution:   Add specific marker in the generated batch file. (Ken Takata,
            closes #5654)
